form.card-description: Tell us about your organization. You'll still remain a member of your current organization, with the ability to switch between them anytime.
form.logo-invalid-mime-type: Invalid file type. Allowed file types are JPG, PNG, and JPEG.
form.name-max-length: Organization name must be less than 255 characters long.
form.name-min-length: Organization name must be at least 3 characters long.
form.name-must-be-string: Organization name must be a string.
form.terms-and-privacy: By creating an organization, you agree to our <1>Terms of Service</1> and <2>Privacy Policy</2>.

organizationsList.card-description: This is a list of all the organizations you're a member of. Pick one to enter and visit its dashboard.
organizationsList.title: Organization List

danger-zone.delete-description: Once deleted, it will be gone forever. Please be certain.
danger-zone.dialog-description: Are you sure you want to delete this organization? This action cannot be undone.
danger-zone.title: Danger Zone

form.logo-invalid-mime-type: Invalid file type. Allowed file types are JPG, PNG, and JPEG.
form.name-description: Your organization's public display name. <1>Warning:</1> Changing the name will break all existing links to your organization.
form.name-max-length: Organization name must be less than 255 characters long.
form.name-min-length: Organization name must be at least 3 characters long.
form.name-must-be-string: Organization name must be a string.
